external_games.name: Doctor Who: Monster Invasion - Vortex Run

name: Doctor Who: Monster Invasion - Vortex Run
summary: Amy Pond and the Eleventh Doctor are on a spaceship on Kaydon 36 when the Time Vortex rips through space. The Eleventh Doctor reaches the TARDIS in time, but Amy is left on the ship and has to run for her life. The Doctor needs to teleport Amy safely back into the TARDIS.
